page.title: 01Introducing Wootton Bassett
page.content:
{Position} : small market town, north Wiltshire, 5 miles SW of Swindon, on A3102, 2 miles M4 Junction 16. {Nearest} : Chippenham,Lyneham, {towns} Malmesbury,Swindon, Cirencester,Marlborough {Site} : ridge of Limestone overlooking clay vales. {Local council:}North Wilts District Council. {Population} : 9135 (1981 Census) {Market Day} : Wednesday {Industries} : Dairy products,farm machinery,stone depot {Farming} : grassland for dairying, some cereals near town
{Please note : the N part of W.Bassett { is in block grid ref. { 04040183
